src:
Stefano Pioli Kecewa Dengan Kinerja Rafael Leao di Laga AC Milan vs Lazio
04 Nov 2019, 19:26 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih AC Milan Stefano Pioli mengaku cukup kecewa dengan performa Rafael Leao di pertandingan melawan Lazio.
Milan menjamu Lazio di giornata 11 Serie A di San Siro, Senin (04/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Rossoneri sempat tampil cukup bagus di babak pertama.
Lazio memang sempat unggul lebih dahulu melalui Ciro Immobile. Namun Milan bisa membalas melalui bunuh diri Bastos.
Di babak kedua, performa Milan menurun meski Pioli sudah memasukkan Leao untuk menambah daya gedor tim. Pada akhirnya Lazio malah bisa mencetak gol kedua melalui Joaquin Correa.
text:
Stefano Pioli Disappointed With Rafael Leao's performance in AC Milan vs Lazio
Nov 04 2019, 19:26 by Bola.net
AC Milan coach Stefano Pioli claims he is quite disappointed with Rafael Leao's performance in the match against Lazio.
Milan entertain Lazio in the giornata 11 Serie A at the San Siro on Monday (11/04/2019) early morning hrs. Rossoneri had performed quite well in the first round.
Lazio did get ahead first through Ciro Immobile. But Milan can retaliate through Bastos' suicide.
In the second half, Milan's performance declined even though Pioli had included Leao to add to the team's banging power. In the end Lazio could even score the second goal through Joaquin Correa.
